head.description: Bonout helps you organize your next event, free et without registration!

howItWorks.create_content: Create your event in a few clicks, without registration and for free!
howItWorks.share_content: Send your unique link to your friends to invite them.
howItWorks.organise_content: Follow the responses and comments to finalize your organization.

first.title: Setup an event
first.content: Prepare your event by giving it a name, description, date and location. In a few seconds you will be able to share it with all your guests! All without registration and for free! No need to have an account on each social network to invite everyone.

second.title: Invitations
second.content: Share your event by messaging, email or QRCode, thanks to your unique link! Only people with your link will be able to find your event.

third.title: Privacy & respect for the user
third.content: These are essential values ​​at Bonout. We do not have any trackers or cookies on the site, as there is no need for them to let you organize your events in good conditions.

fourth.title: Organization
fourth.content: You can manage your entire event from Bonout! Invite your friends, use the comments to communicate with them, and create lists to organize yourself.
